content:
Jim lives at $1^{\text{st}}$ Avenue and $11^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by the point $(1,11)$ on the map below.  He and his best friend decide to go to the bookstore at $5^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and $4^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by $(5, 4)$ on the map.  They walk down $1^{\text{st}}$ Avenue then over on $4^{\text{th}}$ Street. 

**Plot Jim's home and the bookstore on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How many blocks do they walk to get to the bookstore?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] blocks
